name: Mall Quest
description:
A procedurally generated first-person shopping sim made with Unity 4 for the recent Vaporwave Jam on itch.io.

Soak up the relaxing mall atmosphere while tracking down 90's-themed games, movies, and toys from your shopping list in a luxurious purchasing environment that is randomly generated every play-through. Watch out for hoodlums! Play-time is generally ten to fifteen minutes.
